Numeric Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select Numeric from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to display numeric data in a 2D array.

This pane includes the following components:

  • Numeric Data—Displays the numeric data in a 2D array. Click Update to refresh this array.
  • Update—Updates a variable with changes you make in the Preview Pane.
